programme.desc: Old wounds are re-opened when Stevie's estranged mother comes to Drover's and Kate returns from Africa following the demise of her relationship with Dave.

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Donna receives a letter from one of the men she believes could be her father, and Zeke is dismayed when Susan decides to sign up to some classes at Eden Hills University.

programme.title: Friends

programme.title: Desperate Housewives
programme.desc: Gabrielle and Lynette's friendship is on the brink of collapse, whereas Bree and Orson come to an agreement about their marriage. Meanwhile, Susan hatches a plan to help an irrational Katherine, and Danny's vital mistake might cost Angie her freedom. In the meantime, Christmas cheer is curtailed when disaster strikes, as a plane crashes down on Wisteria Lane, putting lives in peril.

programme.desc: Justin and Rebecca's beachside wedding has the Walker family stunned. Tommy risks everything to have his daughter beside him.

programme.desc: Samantha finds out about an endangered butterfly habitat and wants to stop her boss, and the firm's construction project, who will kill them.

programme.desc: Today, the mad scientists discover if rockets can power a pram and what the best alternative painkiller is.

programme.desc: Emily's heartbreak leads her to contemplate suicide; Bob and Jamie try to calm Viv down; and Pollard is unnerved when he hears from his solicitor.
